transcript: it's amazing what you can accomplish when you have no choice most of the hard decisions and the hard times like I didn't have an option they seem like choices and they seem like tough guy I just I didn't perceive a choice like I was like I just have to keep going when I quit my job it was like death or do this and so then I did it I think honestly a lot of the time when it was when it was really tough I just didn't give myself time to dwell on it I just honestly didn't think about it like I knew I was screwed and so it's like well that's not helpful like what else like what can I do four people who are going through it you can't lose if you don't quit like most games worth playing in life for infinite meaning like the point of the game is to keep the game going
